DataElement.preferredName: Local Clinical Study Short Title java.lang.String
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Of or belonging to a restricted area or locality.:Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, study of mechanisms of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiologic, behavior, and health services research._Having little (physical) length or seeming to be limited in (temporal) duration.:A general or descriptive designator for an object, work of art, or literary composition._Generic value domain for a java datatype that is a class that represents character strings.

Concepts.definition: Of or belonging to a restricted area or locality.

Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, study of mechanisms of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiologic, behavior, and health services research.

An official descriptive name of a document, e.g. the long name of a study protocol provided by the study sponsor.
